TopicTitle: Make a wish... and have it horribly corrupted!

Articles.Content:
Granted. However, Anna is a giant, and everyone, including you, drowns in all the mud required to put Anna in that situation.

I wish that all plants were edible.

Granted, most of them are poisonous.

I wish that there were no genders.

Granted. Most animal and plants species, including humankind, go extinct because they rely on sexual reproduction.

I wish it wasn't so hard to think of new wishes.

Granted. Your mind turns to soup from the frustration of having so many wishes and so little time.

I wish I hadn't got so backlogged with Doctor Who.

Granted. Dr. Who is retroactively cancelled, several seasons disappear.

I wish Firefly had lasted for more than one season.

Sure.

They replace the entire cast with Eddie Murphy for the rest of the show.

I wish for Star Wars: Episode VII et. al. to be good.

Granted, they got even worse

i wish that every thing is random.

Granted, ashdhchhsdydheycb (Giant Sharktopus eats everything)

I wish for some Dr. Pepper.

Granted. But it's "New Pepper" and is frankly a bit of a disaster. Unlike with the New Coke fiasco, the original Dr Pepper never comes back.

I wish for more Gigahertz.

Granted, the gigs blow up the earth

I wish tapioca was good

Granted. ERROR 404 NOW MAKING WISH INTO Soup. You Now are dead,when you eat the tapioca.

I wish That,I was A astronaut in the future. to go to mars.

granted. see that doctor who episode about exploding bases

I wish that doctor who was not existing

Granted, error error the dic can't die.

I wish for LOLs.

granted. you also get a fatal cat allergy.

I wish for a nuke to be in my house and not explode

Granted. But you're extraordinarily rendited by the CIA to a secret facility, tortured, and executed.

I wish for a microwave oven to be in my house and not explode.

Granted, the microwave eats you and cooks you.

I wish for a kiwi

Granted. It pecks your feet off. And I mean the fruit.

I wish I had some pop.

Granted. it has poison ivy all over it

I want an interstellar spaceship

Granted, but it's standing in your back yard.

Granted. Have a free One Direction CD.

I liked my corruption better. Of the pop wish, that is.

I wish I had the ability to summon dust bunnies under other people's beds.

Edited November 20, 2014 by Felsmak

Granted. But for every time you do, two appear under your own bed. And they're slightly carnivorous.

I wish I had a One Direction frisbee CD.

Granted. You accidentally listen to it and your ears explode in a tremendous fireball, vaporizing your entire neighborhood.

I wish that I could into space.

Granted, but due to major budget cuts we're sending you in a tin capsule, wearing scuba gear.

I wish for the Flintstones to fling stones. (not at me plz)

Granted, but they stink at aiming, so they accidentally hit you anyway.

I wish for a pet Styracosaurus.

granted. it gets lonely and attempts hump your leg.

i wish for a pizza made of cookie dough with ketchup, bacon and onion toppings to be delivered at my workplace by a drone

You get a delivery drone, but you end like a pizza with lot of ketchup, bacon and topping all around, but yup it almost worked in the first place...

I wish for obama, putin, ..., mr. narco traf1 and his lambs, + the pop to have a productive launch together. (and don't tell me it won't happen)

Edited November 21, 2014 by WinkAllKerb''
IngularS and plurial mean nothing near the north magnetic pole ...
